name: @investool/standalone
description: Magic Investool as a standalone app

scripts.build:server: rm -rf src/routes/api && rm -rf src/libs/cross-platform && cp -r ../web-ui/pages/api src/routes/api && cp -r ../web-ui/libs/cross-platform src/libs/cross-platform && yarn compile
scripts.build:ui: cd ../web-ui && yarn && yarn build && yarn export && rm -rf ../electron/static && cp -r ./out ../electron/static
scripts.build:all: yarn build:server && yarn build:ui && yarn app:dist
